price: Hao ndio ambao vitendo vyao vimeharibika duniani na Akhera. Nao hawatapata wa kuwanusuru.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ
footnotes: Watu wenye sifa kama hizo, a'mali zao zimebat'ilika ijapo kuwa baadhi yake ni njema, na hazina matunda. Kwa hivyo haziwafai duniani, na mwisho wake ni hizaya na adhabu huko Akhera. Na wala hawana wa kuwaokoa na khasara na adhabu watayo ipata.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
